description: Contents: Ibn Gabirol, Azharot le-Shavuʿot (ff. 1r-93v). Asher ben Shelomyah, The Abbreviated Duties of the Heart (ff. 94r-142r). Jonah ben Abraham Gerondi, Sefer ha-yirʼah (ff. 143r-159r). Aristotle (attributed to), Sefer ha-Patuaḥ (ff. 160r-165v).
title: Miscellany
author: Asher ben Shelomyah
